info.title: International Shipping
info.description: The International Shipping API enables sellers to use the Ship with Walmart (SWW) International shipping programs to ship their goods from the US to Canada. These APIs provide support for two SWW Programs : SWW Express & SWW Ground

get.description: Use this API to get consolidation details for the shipment. Provide the domestic Tracking Number and Carrier name. The synchronous API call returns a list of packages consolidated under that tracking number in response. In case of any failure, the client has to retry.

parameters.name: WM.TEST_MODE
parameters.description: If enabled a static response will be returned with carrier and tracking being mapped to the one provided in the request.

parameters.name: WM_CONSUMER.CHANNEL.TYPE
parameters.description: A unique ID to track the consumer request by channel. Use the Consumer Channel Type received during onboarding

parameters.name: WM_QOS.CORRELATION_ID
parameters.description: A unique ID which identifies each API call and used to track and debug issues; use a random generated GUID for this ID

parameters.name: WM_SVC.NAME
parameters.description: Walmart Service Name

parameters.name: WM_SEC.TIMESTAMP
parameters.description: The Epoch timestamp

parameters.name: WM_SEC.AUTH_SIGNATURE
parameters.description: The vendor's digital signature, generated by running the JAR file or custom generation code

parameters.name: WM_CONSUMER.ID
parameters.description: A unique ID required to access the API
parameters.example: Get the Consumer ID from Developer Center after logging in

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Accept Header

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content-Type Header

consolidationId.description: Consolidation ID marking the uniqueness of the transaction

shipmentIds.description: A-List of all shipmentIDs closed out for the tracking number and carrier

items.description: A-List of all shipmentIDs closed out for the tracking number and carrier

domesticTrackingNo.description: Domestic Tracking number provided in the request

domesticCarrierId.description: Domestic Carrier Id provided in the request

items.description: errors

post.description: Use this API to consolidate shipments. Provide the list of packages that form part of the consolidation and its corresponding domestic tracking number and carrier. The synchronous API call returns the status of the operation and a correlation ID in response. Use the correlation ID to connect via email to the IMD team in case of issues pertaining to the consolidation call. In case of any failure, the client has to retry.

parameters.name: WM.TEST_MODE
parameters.description: For sellers/clients who are in the process of on boarding or already on boarded to IMD platforms, this feature allows them to test the API integration to CBT consolidation API. Sellers get a response which maps their request attributes with some additional static information like consolidationId. All input validations are still required to be followed.

parameters.name: WM_CONSUMER.CHANNEL.TYPE
parameters.description: A unique ID to track the consumer request by channel. Use the Consumer Channel Type received during onboarding

parameters.name: WM_QOS.CORRELATION_ID
parameters.description: A unique ID which identifies each API call and used to track and debug issues; use a random generated GUID for this ID

parameters.name: WM_SVC.NAME
parameters.description: Walmart Service Name

parameters.name: WM_SEC.TIMESTAMP
parameters.description: The Epoch timestamp

parameters.name: WM_SEC.AUTH_SIGNATURE
parameters.description: The vendor's digital signature, generated by running the JAR file or custom generation code

parameters.name: WM_CONSUMER.ID
parameters.description: A unique ID required to access the API
parameters.example: Get the Consumer ID from Developer Center after logging in

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Accept Header

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content-Type Header

domesticCarrierId.description: domestic carrier id. Use these values for particular Carriers : 1000 - FEDEX, 1002 - UPS, 1003 - USPS, 1004 - OTHER

domesticTrackingNo.description: Identifies the domestic carrier's (FedEx/UPS/ etc.) tracking number of the master carton used to get the included packages to the PI facility

shipmentIds.description: A List of valid shipment IDs to consolidate as returned by create Shipment API call

items.description: A List of valid shipment IDs to consolidate as returned by create Shipment API call

consolidationId.description: Consolidation ID marking the uniqueness of the transaction

shipmentIds.description: A-List of all shipmentIDs closed out for the tracking number and carrier

items.description: A-List of all shipmentIDs closed out for the tracking number and carrier

domesticTrackingNo.description: Domestic Tracking number provided in the request

domesticCarrierId.description: Domestic Carrier Id provided in the request

items.description: errors

get.description: Use this API to return all shipment details for the shipmentId you provide.

parameters.name: WM.TEST_MODE
parameters.description: If enabled a static response will be returned with shipmentId being mapped to the one provided in the request.

parameters.name: WM_CONSUMER.CHANNEL.TYPE
parameters.description: A unique ID to track the consumer request by channel. Use the Consumer Channel Type received during onboarding

parameters.name: WM_QOS.CORRELATION_ID
parameters.description: A unique ID which identifies each API call and used to track and debug issues; use a random generated GUID for this ID

parameters.description: A unique ID required to access the API
parameters.example: Get the Consumer ID from Developer Center after logging in

parameters.description: Accept Header

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content-Type Header

contactName.description: Name of the person. Both name and company can be included

companyName.description: Name of the organization. Both name and company can be included

city.description: City where the address is located in

state.description: State or province where the address is located in

postalCode.description: ZIP or postal code where the address is located in

country.description: Two-letter ISO code of the country or territory. {https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html}

phone.description: Phone number to reach the person or organization

email.description: Email to reach the person or organization

post.description: Use this API to create an international shipping label and ship your items internationally from the US to Canada. You provide the list of items for the shipment and the pickup address information.

parameters.name: WM.TEST_MODE
parameters.description: For sellers/clients who are in the process of on boarding or already on boarded to IMD platforms, this feature allows them to test the API integration to CBT international label generation API. Sellers get a response which maps their request attributes with some additional static information like tracking and label. The label returned is corresponding to the carrier configured for each seller, in case if the configuration is still in progress a sample Fedex Express label is returned. All input validations are still required to be followed.

parameters.name: WM_CONSUMER.CHANNEL.TYPE
parameters.description: A unique ID to track the consumer request by channel. Use the Consumer Channel Type received during onboarding

parameters.name: WM_QOS.CORRELATION_ID
parameters.description: A unique ID which identifies each API call and used to track and debug issues; use a random generated GUID for this ID

parameters.description: The Epoch timestamp

parameters.description: A unique ID required to access the API

authorization.description: Basic authorization header. Base 64 encodes the Client ID and Client Secret retrieved in step two of the integration steps.
